channel.title: Launch Url, CMD Prompt Close
channel.description:
Stupid question i know, but when i launch my client how what code do i need to insert in my client.java to make my forums lauch at the same time?
Also how do i make it so when u run the client the command prompt closes and the client still opens?

item.title: Launch Url, CMD Prompt Close
item.dc:creator: @Ebowne24 Ebowne24
item.description:
@Ebowne24 wrote:

Bumped… I would love to know how to close the CMD prompt… Been trying to figure it out for forever…

Read full topic
